basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Rocio Martinez and I most recently worked as a biomedical technician in the Army. I left after completing my contract and I wanted to take advantage of the educational benefits. In the hospitals, medical equipment is mixing with technology so I thought it was important for me to be educated on both topics. In the future I hope to work on advanced medical systems like MRI and x-ray units. I have a Top Secret Security Clearance and an advanced certification in Radiographic/Fluoroscopic Imaging Systems, but my biggest asset is a solution seeking, critical thinking approach to any problem. ðŸ’œ

projects.title: Cookie Stand
projects.description: A very challenging project, this site was designed for a cookie company that would have a home and sales page. The sales page needed to feature an interactive table to display sales values and capable of adding a new store through the use of a form.

projects.title: Hobby Generator
projects.description: Group project with 3 other collaboraters; Alex Chao, Jonathon Stillson, and Kyle Knight. Website was designed to match users to a list of hobbies based off collected input. Website consits of 4 unique pages, feel free to visit and checkout the library for awesome hobby ideas.

projects.title: Odd Duck
projects.description: A fun and very interactive project. This site was built to help a company gather votes from its empoyees in order to select the next featured product. After the voting rounds were completed the user could see a chart detailing each products views and votes made.
